name: cloudlog1
description: A deductive database for the 21st century

scripts.test: docker run -i --link=mongo --link=fakes3 --link=rabbitmq -v $PWD:/project -v /tmp:/tmp brosenan/nodalion npm run-script test-in-container
scripts.start: docker run -it --rm --link=mongo --link=fakes3 --link=rabbitmq -v $PWD:/project -v /tmp:/tmp -v /var:/var -p 8080:80 brosenan/nodalion npm run-script start-in-container

author: Boaz Rosenan <brosenan@gmail.com>
